items.sentence: The doctor told Tom to stop eating dog food.
Tom\'s wife is three years older than he is.
We couldn\'t have done it without your help.
Nobody can live to be two hundred years old.
Do you have anything else planned for today?
Do you know where we could get one of those?
Both of Tom\'s brothers are taller than him.
I want you here as soon as you can get here.
How many brothers and sisters does Tom have?
How many cars were involved in the accident?
How many people got on at the last bus stop?
How many people want to go swimming with us?
Tom wants to follow in his dad\'s footsteps.
I studied French for three hours last night.
Tom and Mary have just returned from Boston.
Tom wouldn\'t let Mary look at his pictures.
Tom\'s loud snoring kept me awake all night.
Let\'s get something to eat on the way home.
Everyone\'s been complaining about the snow.
Everyone\'s waiting to see what Tom will do.
